seo.heading: Why a business facility permit is important
seo.intro: In Vienna and throughout Austria, many businesses require a business facility permit according to the Trade Act. Our free check helps you quickly and easily find out whether your business requires a permit.
seo.feature1Text: In just 2 minutes you will receive an initial assessment of whether you need a business facility permit. No complicated forms, no waiting times.
seo.feature2Text: Our service is available in 8 languages: German, English, Serbian, Croatian, Turkish, Italian, Spanish and Ukrainian - accessible to all entrepreneurs in Vienna.
seo.feature3Text: The check is completely free and your data remains private. No registration required, no hidden costs.
seo.whyTitle: When do you need a business facility permit?
seo.whyText: A business facility permit is required in Austria for many commercial activities. The exemption regulation determines which businesses are exempt from the permit requirement. Factors such as business area, noise, operating hours and type of activity play an important role.

questionnaire.title: Business Facility Permit Check
questionnaire.subtitle: Answer the following questions so we can assess whether you need a permit

businessType.question: What type of business do you operate?

address.question: Where is your business facility located?

businessArea.question: How large is the business area?

guestBeds.question: How many guest beds do you offer?

swimmingPool.question: Does the facility have swimming pools or similar facilities?

meals.question: What meals do you offer to guests?

operatingHours.question: Your operating hours
operatingHours.compliant: My operating hours are within these times
operatingHours.nonCompliant: I need operating hours outside these times

ventilation.question: Do you have mechanical system parts for ventilation or heat transfer outside the building envelope?

hazardousMaterials.question: Do you store hazardous materials or substances that require special labeling?

music.question: Do you play live music or reproduce music (louder than background music)?

ippcStorage.question: Does your storage correspond to IPPC definitions (Annex 3 or 5 of the Trade Act)?

result.title: Your Result
result.noPermitDescription: Based on your information, your business facility is exempt from permits.
result.permitDescription: Based on your information, your business facility requires a permit.
